entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , East Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:47 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: East Point 01:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: NE 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. A few flurries beginning late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 8:30 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the morning and early afternoon. Amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming north 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High zero with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:30 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 8:30 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023
